column4: Yes you can even use md5sums to find certain files.  I use them to find kiddy porn on computers i'm investigating.
that's WAY out of line for this channel ...
not to mention it shows a complete ignorance of what md5 does ;)
? i'm le
and no its not we can search by hashes or md5sums
excuse my ignorance with the terminology.
he doesn't need a full mail server just sending
he needs SMTP. Postfix is SMTP. and only SMTP.
I thought postfix was a full mail server
nvm it is just a mta
no, you need Dovecot or similar for POP3/IMAP
nah postfix can send and receive mail
receiving mail is part of SMTP. ssmtp just does not implement it.
thats why i was suggesting just using ssmtp much easier to setup than postfix
postfix has become too complex over the years for a simple mta. but to each his own.
do NOT use *.*
that will change the permissions of your entire filesystem. not just the dir you are in.
No no I would add a path infront
chmod a-w -R /blah/Music/*.*
that makes sense
Wouldn't that remove write from all the directories also and not just the mp3 files in sub directoires?
i'd use xargs to do that.
